stories.text:
Hi there,

Problem: You don't want to be present for every topic on the agenda, and you don't want all your meetings scheduled randomly. Right?

Solution: People submit discussion topics to Remeet, and we optimally schedule single-topic meetings for you.

Remeet automatically manages all the topics, rearranges topics based on their urgency, and reschedules topics when participants' availability changes.

No need to manage agendas manually, no need to waste precious meeting time discussing the agenda, no need to wait for your topic on the agenda — you no longer need agendas.

Every event on your calendar is an agenda topic relevant to you.

This allows you to:

- Discuss more topics in less time

- Condense all your meetings by a factor of two (at least)

- Reduce the time spent in chats/emails

- Make more space for deep work

Sign up on our website to schedule a concierge onboarding session. https://www.remeet.com
